column1: I led a letter along with my colleagues of the San Diego Congressional Delegation demanding that Border Patrol provide us with detailed information on their removal of native plants without warning.
Local organizations and constituents in my district have dedicated their time and resources to Friendship Park.  https://t.co/JrFZRdjSUE

One year ago I was proud to cosponsor #HR8 the Bipartisan Background Checks Act and say #EnoughIsEnough. Our communities deserve to feel safer from gun violence; it’s time for Leader McConnell to bring this bill up for a vote.

One year ago I was proud to cosponsor #HR8 the Bipartisan Background Checks Act and to say #EnoughIsEnough. Our communities deserve to feel safer from gun violence it’s time for Leader McConnell to put this bill up for a vote.

President Trump has escalated violence in Iran without briefing Congress.  The Administration must brief Congress on their next steps to help protect the best interest of the American People our troops and national security.

One year ago the American people sent House Democrats to Washington with one mission: Fight #ForThePeople. We had an impactful 2019 serving #CA51 constituents and look forward to continuing our fight in 2020. #YearInReview https://t.co/AK159VAJaU
https://t.co/37JFj5t6Zj
Wishing my friend and colleague @repjohnlewis peace and strength. You are an inspiration and hero to many; the entire nation is standing with you during this time. https://t.co/iRPFj3yRuc
I hope everyone celebrating in California’s 51st district and around the world had a wonderful #Hanukkah! https://t.co/QUpz3DVLBV
Wishing everyone in San Diego and the Imperial County a peaceful and joyous day with your family and loved ones.  Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays! https://t.co/lO6vFu8B75
Congress has a responsibility to protect our constitution and national security.  No one is above the law.

The Trump Administration owes Congress answers -- we need to know how many people endured #FamilySeparation and the plan to reunify every child with their loved ones. It’s time to end this cruel government-sanctioned child abuse. #HumanRightsDay  https://t.co/1Am5h56fmb

This is unacceptable children should not be dying under our watch.  I sent a letter to DHS last week requesting transparency on their policies and procedures currently in place to reduce the spread of infectious diseases and to ensure the health and well-being of detainees. https://t.co/Q01wlo4fh0

Open Enrollment is here! Now is the time to shop around understand your options and get covered by the December 15 deadline.  Visit https://t.co/KQQo75BTIT to enroll today! https://t.co/B5EL6eAVgp

Latinas are making waves across the country as community leaders heads of households and rising professionals. Yet these women still only make 54 cents compared to every dollar a white non-Hispanic male makes. Latinas deserve better! #LatinaEqualPayDay https://t.co/l1NlDKyawH
I’m proud to be serving alongside the first Native American women in Congress @RepDebHaaland & @ShariceDavids. #NativeAmericanHeritageMonth https://t.co/NQwn3IdGod

White nationalists like Stephen Miller should not be allowed anywhere near the White House.   It is no surprise that this administration’s immigration policies are inhumane and based on racist rhetoric.  As a member of Congress I ask that Miller resign immediately. https://t.co/oLHV4qoL1w

I am deeply saddened by yet another school shooting.  Our children have the right to a safe education free of violence and fear.  @senatemajldr our nation is better than this #EnoughIsEnough! https://t.co/C7kHMDK6WQ
#ProtectTheDream https://t.co/BXkVP3O0O3

This #VeteransDay I salute all service members who so bravely defended our freedom and sacrificed everything for our nation.
Although this was a dark time for California we persevered and changed history by rallying our community to organize vote and participate in state politics.
Today marks the 25th anniversary of the divisive and anti-immigrant Prop 187 which would have banned immigrants from basic public services. https://t.co/DTiDSXZ0k6

The fact remains that many organizations don't have the funds to upgrade their VSOs making their facilities a literal barrier for disabled veterans to access their services. Living with disabilities should not prevent our veterans from accessing the benefits they deserve.

I’m proud to have joined @IMPCountyVSO and veterans to unveil the Grants for Improvement of Veteran Establishments (GIVE) Act. Our veterans have given us so much by serving our country and protecting our freedom it is time to give back to them. https://t.co/vcQY1JmJcH
Climate change is real and an existential crisis. The Trump administration’s irresponsible decision to pull the United States out of the Paris Climate Agreement is a substantial threat to our planet.
As a member of Congress I believe our nation has a moral obligation to provide our future generations with a healthy environment. https://t.co/dHGPMjm9XW

From protecting health care to raising the minimum wage defending our democracy to ending gun violence House Democrats have been tirelessly advancing progress #ForThePeople.  @senatemajldr would rather let real solutions gather cobwebs on his desk.   What's he afraid of? https://t.co/V5WXCPJLGK

I am proud to join Rep. Takano and Rep. Grijalva to establish a system that tracks noncitizen service members ensures a path to citizenship for those that are eligible and gives officials the tools they need to properly handle cases involving potentially removable veterans. https://t.co/JbXEa31Pvv

I am proud to support H.Res. 296 the Armenian Genocide Resolution which reaffirms that our nation recognizes the atrocities of the Armenian genocide. The resolution passed overwhelmingly in honor of those who lost their lives and the many families who were displaced.

Would Zuckerberg hit “Like” on being compared to Trump? https://t.co/gGSC99oYBM

When women succeed the country succeeds. Proud to stand with @HouseDemWomen as they unveil their bold policy agenda to support women & families. https://t.co/jzLL2D53Ty

For many of California's small businesses Small Business Development Centers are a key part of their success. I helped pass the SBDC Improvement Act today to help expand SBDCs and improve the program for small businesses and entrepreneurs across America.

President Trump’s irrational act to remove our troops from Syria is not only betraying and endangering our allies but is putting our national security at risk by inviting a possible ISIS resurgence. https://t.co/u8dwH45W5N

Today we remember the struggles of the first people to call this land home.  Happy #IndigenousPeoplesDay a day to celebrate appreciate and honor Native American peoples.
Forcing migrants to #RemainInMexico is not protecting but rather exposing these already vulnerable people to organized crime.
Asylum seekers are continuing to face the same conditions that made them migrate in the first place: violence extortion lack of basic resources and human rights violations. https://t.co/9tFbn1Ea5i

Today marks a positive step toward holding President Trump accountable for his abuses of power.

I am proud to have introduced the NAD Bank Pollution Solution Act with my San Diego Democratic Congressional Delegation which will create more funding for infrastructure improvements to prevent transboundary sewage flows.

The sewage spills are unacceptable. I sent a letter to the International Boundary and Water Commission today urging them to address our concerns with the recent spills and the amount of time it has taken to notify the public.

.@RepSusanDavis is an amazing colleague and friend. It has been a pleasure to serve alongside her. The 53rd Congressional District was well served by her tireless devotion to her constituents. Congress will not be the same without her. Enjoy your future endeavors Susan! - Juan
Happy #LaborDay to all the hard working women and men who are the fabric of America. I will continue to work on behalf of workers in Congress to reaffirm that equal work deserves equal pay.

My thoughts are with the families of the victims of the #OdessaShooting. These atrocities should not be a weekly recurrence in our communities. It is time for the Senate to take up legislation to expand background checks in gun sales.

Today we celebrate #WomensEqualityDay marking the 99th anniversary of the 19th Amendment which gave women the right to vote. We must continue the ideals of the movement by working to advance and protect women's rights and equality.

My heart is broken for #ElPaso yet another community devastated by gun violence. Thoughts and prayers will not cure this tragic epidemic - we need immediate action. We need gun reform now.
